alert.note: Alert for Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:05PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY THROUGH 930 PM EDT... At 905 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem, Blue River, New Pekin, New Philadelphia, Kossuth, Farabee, South Boston, Plattsburg, Canton and New Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
